content: I'm glad you mentioned Uncharted 4's cinematic approach. It's definitely one of the game's strongest aspects. By the way, I've been thinking about my gaming habits lately, and I realized that I spent around 30 hours playing The Last of Us Part II on hard difficulty, which was a really challenging but rewarding experience. Do you think Uncharted 4's difficulty level is comparable to The Last of Us Part II's hard mode?
